news.title: Noodle chanllange
news.content: The annual noodle challenge is back! The event will be held on May 20th, 2021.

news.title: South Asian food expo
news.content: The South Asian food expo is back! The event will be held on June 20th, 2021.

news.title: 3 street kittens find a noew home
news.content: 3 cute street kittens are adopted by a kind lady.

news.title: New high-speed railway facilitates transportation in Hechi
news.content: A new high-speed railway between Yunnan's Kunming and Fujian's Xiamen which will pass through Guangxi Zhuang autonomous region has entered the planning stage, officials from Liuzhou announced on March 26.
